item.title: Code on remote servers with Visual Studio Code via SSH
item.description: Introduction Have you ever struggled with debugging your code on remote servers? There are usually two issues associated with debugging on remote hosting. You are not well versed with terminal-based editors like Vim and Nano Coding locally, uploading to GitHub, downloading on remote server, and restarting servers with updating code is tiresome Well, I have the perfect way for you! You can connect your Visual Studio Code application to your remote server directly via SSH.
